name: Obon - Ceccotti Collezioni
description: A pendant light whose name and design hearken back to the festival of the same name that takes place in Japan every August, and which is symbolised by the lantern. Inspired by traditional Japanese lanterns, it features a white opal glass center, American walnut exterior rings, a silk-covered lampshade, and burnished bronze connecting rods. Available in various colors and patterns, it can be customized with customers' own fabric or wallpaper.
